下.definition: down; downwards; below; lower; later; next (week etc); second (of two parts); to decline; to go down; to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc); measure word to show the frequency of an action

下一站.definition: the next stop (of a bus etc)

下三爛.definition: variant of 下三濫|下三滥[xia4 san1 lan4]

下不了臺.definition: to be unable to extricate oneself gracefully; to be put on the spot; to be embarrassed

下不來臺.definition: to be put on the spot; to find oneself in an awkward situation

下不為例.definition: not to be repeated; not to be taken as a precedent; just this once

下世.definition: to die; future incarnation; next life; to be born; to come into the world; future generation

下令.definition: to give an order; to issue an order

下任.definition: next office holder; next to serve

下來.definition: to come down; (completed action marker); (after verb of motion, indicates motion down and towards us, also fig.); (indicates continuation from the past towards us); to be harvested (of crops); to be over (of a period of time); to go among the masses (said of leaders)

下個.definition: second (of two parts); next (week etc); subsequent; the following

下凡.definition: (of immortals) to descend to the human world

下午茶.definition: afternoon tea (light afternoon meal, typically pastries with tea or coffee)

下半場.definition: second half of a game or contest

下半時.definition: second half of a game or contest

下半身.definition: lower half of one's body; Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)

下去.definition: to go down; to descend; to go on; to continue; (of a servant) to withdraw

下單.definition: to place an order; to order

下地.definition: to go down to the fields; to get up from bed; to leave one's sickbed; to be born

下垂.definition: to droop; to sag; to hang down; sagging; drooping; prolapse (medicine)

下墜.definition: (of objects) to fall; to drop; to droop; (medicine) to experience tenesmus

下士.definition: lowest-ranked noncommissioned officer (e.g. corporal in the army or petty officer, third class in the navy)

下奶.definition: to produce milk; to lactate; to promote lactation

下嫁.definition: (of a woman) to marry a man of lower social status; to marry down

下家.definition: player whose turn comes next (in a game); next one; my humble home

下寒武.definition: lower Cambrian (geological period approx 530 million years ago)

下寒武統.definition: lower Cambrian series (geological strata from approx 530 million years ago)

下屆.definition: next office holder; next to serve

下層.definition: underlayer; lower class; lower strata; substrate

下山.definition: to go down a hill; (of the sun or moon) to set

下崗.definition: (of a guard, sentry etc) to come off duty; (of a worker) be to laid off

下崽.definition: (of animals) to give birth; to foal, to whelp etc

下工.definition: to knock off (at the end of a day's work); to finish work

下工夫.definition: to put in time and energy; to concentrate one's efforts

下廚.definition: to go to the kitchen (to prepare a meal); to cook

下弦.definition: last quarter, aka third quarter (phase of the moon)

下弦月.definition: third quarter moon, aka last quarter moon

下情.definition: feelings of the masses; my situation (humble speech)

下手.definition: to start; to put one's hand to; to set about; the seat to the right of the main guest

下拜.definition: to bow down low; to make obeisance; to kneel and bow

下挫.definition: (of sales, prices etc) to fall; to drop; decline; slump

下擺.definition: hem of a skirt; shirt tail

下放.definition: to delegate; to decentralize; to demote a party cadre to work on the shop floor or in the countryside

下方.definition: underneath; below; the underside; world of mortals; to descend to the world of mortals (of gods)

下期.definition: next period (week, month or quarter etc)

下架.definition: to take down from the shelves (e.g. a contaminated product)

下榻.definition: to stay (at a hotel etc during a trip)

下款.definition: signature on letter; name of donor

下毒.definition: to put poison in sth; to poison

下毒手.definition: to attack murderously; to strike treacherously

下毛毛雨.definition: to drizzle; to rain lightly; (fig.) (coll.) to give (sb) a heads-up; to break (some bad news) gently; to scold mildly

下沉市場.definition: the Chinese market, excluding first- and second-tier cities

下注.definition: to pour; to pour down (of rain); to lay a bet

下流.definition: lower course of a river; low-class; mean and lowly; vulgar; obscene

下浣.definition: last ten days of the lunar month

下海.definition: to go out to sea; to enter the sea (to swim etc); (fig.) to take the plunge (e.g. leave a secure job, or enter prostitution etc)

下游.definition: lower reaches (of a river); lower level; lower echelon; downstream

下滑.definition: to slide down (a slope etc); (fig.) to decline

下焦.definition: (TCM) lower burner, the part of the body within the pelvic cavity (below the navel, including the kidneys, bladder and intestines)

下片.definition: to stop screening a movie; to end the run of a movie

下狠心.definition: to resolve (to do sth); to toughen up

下班.definition: to finish work; to get off work; next service (train, bus, etc)

下界.definition: lower bound (math.); world of mortals; (of gods) to descend to the world of mortals

下發.definition: to issue (a memorandum etc) to lower levels; to distribute (e.g. disaster relief to victims)

下級.definition: low ranking; low level; underclass; subordinate

下網.definition: to cast a fishing net; (computing) to go offline

下線.definition: to go offline; (of a product) to roll off the assembly line; downline (person below oneself in a pyramid scheme)

下聘.definition: to send the betrothal gifts; (fig.) to conclude a marriage

下肚.definition: to consume (food or drink); to eat; to drink

下腰.definition: (gymnastics) to do a bridge; to do a crab

下腳料.definition: remnants of material from an industrial process; offcut; scraps

下臺.definition: to go off the stage; to fall from position of prestige; to step down (from office etc); to disentangle oneself; to get off the hook

下花園.definition: Xiahuayuan District of Zhangjiakou city 張家口市|张家口市[Zhang1 jia1 kou3 shi4], Hebei

下花園區.definition: Xiahuayuan District of Zhangjiakou city 張家口市|张家口市[Zhang1 jia1 kou3 shi4], Hebei

下藥.definition: to prescribe medicine; to poison; to slip a drug (into sb's drink etc)

下行.definition: (of trains) down (i.e. away from the capital); (of river boats) to travel downstream; to issue (a document) to lower bureaucratic levels; (of writing on the page) vertical, proceeding from top to bottom

下裝.definition: to take off costume and makeup; bottom garment (trousers etc)

下西洋.definition: to sail west (from China) (used in reference to the 15th century voyages of Zheng He 鄭和|郑和[Zheng4 He2] to regions bordering the Indian Ocean)

下視.definition: to look down from above; (fig.) to look down on; to despise

下設.definition: (of an organization) to have as a subunit

下詔.definition: to hand down an imperial edict

下課.definition: to finish class; to get out of class; (fig.) (esp. of a sports coach) to be dismissed; to be fired

下調.definition: to adjust downwards; to lower (prices, wages etc)

下議院.definition: lower chamber (of legislative body); lower house; the House of Commons

下跪.definition: to kneel; to go down on one's knees

下身.definition: lower part of the body; genitalia; trousers

下車.definition: to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)

下輩.definition: offspring; future generations; younger generation of a family; junior members of a group

下轄.definition: to administer; to have jurisdiction over

下逐客令.definition: to ask sb to leave; to show sb the door; to give a tenant notice to leave

下達.definition: to transmit to lower levels; to issue (a command, decree etc)

下邊兒.definition: erhua variant of 下邊|下边[xia4 bian5]

下酒.definition: to be appropriate to have with alcohol; to down one's drink

下酒菜.definition: dish that goes well with alcoholic drinks; snack eaten with drinks

下里巴人.definition: folk songs of the state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]; popular art forms (contrasted with 陽春白雪|阳春白雪[yang2 chun1 bai2 xue3], highbrow art forms)

下野.definition: to step down from office; to go into opposition

下鍋.definition: to put into the pot (to cook)

下關市.definition: Shimonoseki, city in Yamaguchi Prefecture, Japan

下降.definition: to decline; to drop; to fall; to go down; to decrease

下陸.definition: Xialu district of Huangshi city 黃石市|黄石市[Huang2 shi2 shi4], Hubei

下陸區.definition: Xialu district of Huangshi city 黃石市|黄石市[Huang2 shi2 shi4], Hubei

下面.definition: below; under; next; the following; also pr. [xia4 mian5]

下頭.definition: (slang) (of a person or manner) off-putting; (slang) to feel put off

下風.definition: leeward; downwind; disadvantageous position; to concede or give way in an argument

下飛機.definition: to get off a plane; to deplane

下飯.definition: to eat one's rice with an accompanying dish (to make the rice more palatable); (of a dish) to go well with rice

下館子.definition: to eat out; to eat at a restaurant

下馬.definition: to dismount from a horse; (fig.) to abandon (a project)

下馬威.definition: display of severity immediately on taking office; (fig.) initial show of strength

下體.definition: lower body; euphemism for genitals; root and stem of plants
